## ConfirmationDialogComponent.showConfirmation() method

Shows confirmation dialog and stores data that are passed to confirmed event

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
showConfirmation(data: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | <code>any</code> | Data that are passed through dialog |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
